title: 4C-ID Model-Based Video Learning for Enhancing Medical Decision-Making Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical knowledge and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based decision-making training program for current healthcare professionals, with a real-time collaborative learning environment utilizing personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can perform systematic decision-making processes in complex clinical situations by applying the four components of the 4C-ID model: learning objectives, supportive information, procedural information, and part-task practice
Learners can evaluate diagnostic reasoning skills and derive improvement plans by combining video learning materials with real-world cases
Learners can achieve 85% or higher performance criteria in team-based project evaluations based on peer feedback

resources: 20-Minute Educational Video Based on the 4C-ID Model

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
